query:
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.role, lp.id as learner_id, lp.current_oral, lp.target_oral 
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN learner_profiles lp ON u.id = lp.user_id 
WHERE u.name LIKE '%Contact%' OR u.email LIKE '%contact%'
LIMIT 5;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.root --database gvnmYNphKZgt9jM9K8Vi9K --execute SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.role, lp.id as learner_id, lp.current_oral, lp.target_oral 
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN learner_profiles lp ON u.id = lp.user_id 
WHERE u.name LIKE '%Contact%' OR u.email LIKE '%contact%'
LIMIT 5;
